com.netflix.msl.msg
Interface ErrorMessageRegistry

All Known Implementing Classes:
MslControl.DummyMessageRegistry
public interface ErrorMessageRegistry

The error message registry is used to provide localized user-consumable messages for specific MSL errors.

Method Summary
 String getUserMessage(MslError err, List<String> languages)
          Returns the user-consumable message associated with the given MSL error, localized according to the list of preferred languages.
 String getUserMessage(Throwable err, List<String> languages)
          Returns the user-consumable message associated with a given non-MSL error, localized according to the list of preferred languages.
 

Method Detail

getUserMessage

String getUserMessage(MslError err,
                      List<String> languages)
Returns the user-consumable message associated with the given MSL error, localized according to the list of preferred languages.

Parameters:
err - MSL error.
languages - preferred languages as BCP-47 codes in descending order. May be null.
Returns:
the localized user message or null if there is none.

getUserMessage

String getUserMessage(Throwable err,
                      List<String> languages)
Returns the user-consumable message associated with a given non-MSL error, localized according to the list of preferred languages.

Parameters:
err - non-MSL error.
languages - preferred languages as BCP-47 codes in descending order. May be null.
Returns:
the localized user message or null if there is none.
